text: 1. When it comes to ice cream, Eddie prefers to get soft serve but then puts it in the freezer so it hardens. I am adamant that this ruins it. Defeats the purpose! Thoughts? 2. This homemade pistachio syrup is blowing my mind. Making it today. 3. Nothing on earth sounds worse to me than sleeping with socks on. 4. The way the tajin crunchy peanuts have a hold on me…  the tanginess of tajin. It’s brilliant. 5. TV things!! The White Lotus!! Whaaaat. I also watched the Karen Read documentary on HBO and started Pulse! Also, the 1923 finale absolutely gutted me. 6. Food trends of 2025. 7. I want to learn how to make soup dumplings! They are one of our favorite things to eat. 8. The biggest your dream, the better version you become! Gives me encouragement because I’m a crazy wacky dreamer. I don’t really think anything is impossible! 9. ONE WEEK left to order Easy Everyday! Did you order your copy yet?!
html:
1. When it comes to ice cream, Eddie prefers to get soft serve but then puts it in the freezer so it hardens. I am adamant that this ruins it. Defeats the purpose! Thoughts?

2. This homemade pistachio syrup is blowing my mind. Making it today.

3. Nothing on earth sounds worse to me than sleeping with socks on.

4. The way the tajin crunchy peanuts have a hold on me…  the tanginess of tajin. It’s brilliant.

5. TV things!! The White Lotus!! Whaaaat. I also watched the Karen Read documentary on HBO and started Pulse! Also, the 1923 finale absolutely gutted me.

6. Food trends of 2025.

7. I want to learn how to make soup dumplings! They are one of our favorite things to eat.

8. The biggest your dream, the better version you become! Gives me encouragement because I’m a crazy wacky dreamer. I don’t really think anything is impossible!

9. ONE WEEK left to order Easy Everyday! Did you order your copy yet?!
